description: Sedge (Carex ciliatomarginata 'Treasure Island') is an amazing plant species that will add texture and foliage interest to any landscape. With its decorative yellowish-green leaves and soft, unique texture, this sedge stands out in the garden. It is one of the toughest varieties of sedge and is extremely drought tolerant, making it an ideal choice for low-maintenance gardens. It is also a clumping grass-like plant with a medium to dwarf size that can be left alone or trimmed to desired shape. Its bright color helps to lighten shady areas and draws attention to whatever corner of the garden it is in. The 'Treasure Island' sedge is an incredible ornamental addition for any garden.
